contentrichtext.text: '''''Ian Wallace''''' was the pen name of science-fiction author John Wallace Pritchard (1912â€“1998).<ref>[http://www.reviewjournal.com/lvrj_home/1998/Jul-09-Thu-1998/news/7814959.html "Deaths" ''Las Vegas Review-Journal'', July 9, 1998]</ref> ==Introduction== Ian Wallace was born in [[Chicago, Illinois]] but spent most of his life living in and around [[Detroit, Michigan]]. Wallace was a practicing clinical [[psychologist]] for many years, and also had an extensive background in [[education]]. Much of his career was spent working for the Detroit public schools system.<ref>[http://sites.google.com/site/ianwallacescifi/Home/who-is-ian-wallace Henderson, M (1990) "Who Is Ian Wallace?"
